attributes.action: Allow yellow striped dimaond travel card to be used 24/7
attributes.additional_details:
Petition to get the restriction of not being able, to use a dimaond travel card before 9AM

Allow holders of the disbaled persons dimaond travel card the useage of there cards 24/7. with no restrcitons.

Please go here: http://www.bristol.gov.uk/page/transport-and-streets/bus-passes-concessionary-travel - to find out more about diamond travel cards, hopefully this will help you relaise why it so important that disbaled should people to be able to use their pass before 9AM all the time.
